      • pageReader

        public static Reader pageReader(URL url,
                String[] data,
                boolean post)
                         throws IOException
        Return a reader for a URL with pre or post data
        Parameters:
        url - URL to submit to
        data - Array of "key","value","key2","value2",...
        post - true to post data, false for get
        Returns:
        reader for reading from the URL
        Throws:
        IOException

      • pageContents

        public static String pageContents(URL url,
                  String data,
                  boolean post)
                           throws IOException
        Return the contents of a URL with pre or post data
        Parameters:
        url - URL to submit to
        data - String of "key=value&amp;otherkey=othervalue" post data
        post - true to post data, false for get
        Returns:
        data returned by server
        Throws:
        IOException

      • pageReader

        public static Reader pageReader(URL url,
                String data,
                boolean post)
                         throws IOException
        Return a Reader for a URL with pre or post data
        Parameters:
        url - URL to submit to
        data - String of "{code key=value&otherkey=othervalue}" post data
        post - true to post data, false for get
        Returns:
        data returned by server
        Throws:
        IOException

      • URLopenConnection

        protected static URLConnection URLopenConnection(URL url)
                                          throws IOException
        Open connection with workarounds.

        Currently specifically sets user-agent because with Java Web Start the system property http.agent does not properly set the user-agent for connections.

        See also Networking specifics under Java Web Start.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • createQueryString

        protected static String createQueryString(String[] data,
                       boolean post)
                                   throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Return a query string from arguments for pre or post
        Parameters:
        data - Array of "key=value" Strings
        Returns:
        single String with urlencoded data
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
